name: PART-TIME DEATH
description:
IMPORTANT BUG WARNING!!!!

Hi. There's an important bug found in the game. When you defeat Pumpo with a proyectile attack, the game will crash. It doesn't mean that the game is over, we just commited a mistake and we are sorry for that.  If that's not the case, you can continue fighting with bosses. As it only happens with the first boss, if you are lucky and you avoid it, you can continue. We'll probably fix it later once the Boss Rush Jam is over, in addition to other bugs that we could find. We'll agree your help and again, sorry for the problems.

Here's the full OST of the game:


It's your turn to be The Death.  In this new adventure, you'll have to create strategies with a random-weapon system for defeat weird and evil villains. 

Controls:

  • A and D: Move
  • Space: Jump
  • Space + space: Double jump
  • J: Attack
  • S + Space: Sweep
  • W + J: Special attack (only if the bar is ful)

From the developers:

Hey! This is the latest Badlife Games project. It's a small boss rush. We know that there are some bugs and mistakes. If everything goes well, we might consider release an update fixing everything . We hope you enjoy this new project as much as we did developing it.

Credits

Due to constraints, we were not able to put the credits in the game, so here they are:

  • Lead Artist: None
  • Programmers: None and GeoMont
  • Lead Composer: GeoMont
  • Special thanks to Halozo, Omar and Juan for helping us with ideas and testing.
